title: Meeting Notes
content:
Meeting Notes #  08th January, 2022 #  Attendees
 Apurv Aman Manapure Siddharth Balayan Kavisha Seth Febin Jose  Mentors - Siddharth Tanna & Setu Parimi
Details
 Tanna explain everyone on how to get started with the CNCF Landscape and how to go through each section of it. Each candidate were given a task to explore about the Container Runtime and different tools included in it (containerd, cri-o, etc.) and Balyan will given presentation on this followed by the discussion with everyone. Setu presented a very interesting topic on FPE (Format Preserving Encryption), with technical demo and how vaults utilize it so that the sensitive data can be utilized for analytics purposes without giving away the secrets.

title: Study Path
content: Study Path #  Prerequisite #   Get Started with Git Getting Started with Docker Docker Security AWS Security Fundamentals Learn AWS (Hands-On) Getting Started with Python  Week 1 #    CNCF Landscape  Container Runtime
